name: Loot Goblin
description:
Story

You play as a loot goblin returning home after successfully stealing 3 artifacts from the humans. Your job now is to store those artifacts in the dungeon as your back is starting to hurt, but as you enter your dungeon you notice something different.....

Description

This is an adventure game filled with action made in less than 5 days. The game was made under the given theme of "Less is More" and because of that we chose to use the least amount of pixels to make a readable image, therefore all sprites and tiles in this game are in 8x8 form and to fit the theme with a game mechanic, the goblin has to retrieve the items to the dungeon instead of taking them and overloading yourself with items.

Please leave a comment

We are a new team and this is our second game ever so we ask you to please leave a comment with feedback on the game as we are trying our best to learn.

Thanks for anything!

Controls

WASD -> Move

J -> Attack

I -> Interact

Esc -> Back to Start Menu
